input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Gym Shirt'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Lightweight Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Long-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Brevet Lightweight Short Sleeve Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Gore-Tex Infinium long sleeve jersey Men's'
  - Name='Rapha Core Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Contender Bicycles Rapha Core Lightweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Brevet Lightweight Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Essenza Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Vortice Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Aero Race 8S Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Men's Pearl Izumi Summit Short-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Men's Attack Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Collapse Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Unlimited Allroad Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Elevate Short Sleeve Jersey Men's'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Entrata 3 Full Zip Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Tradizione Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Men's Summit Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='PRO Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Evade Pro Base 2.0 Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Supergiara Logo Cycling Jersey + Shorts Set'
  - Name='Assos Men's Mille GTS Jersey S11'
  - Name='Woman Sportful Supergiara W Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product type and brand category, likely similar function, features, and cycling focus as the Pedal Mafia Core Jersey.
Same brand but a gym shirt is a different product type intended for different activities, not cycling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core Lightweight Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar cycling jersey focused on lightweight performance, close to the reference product's core function.
Long-sleeve variant of a core cycling jersey; similar construction and purpose with slight variation in sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Brevet Lightweight Short Sleeve Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lightweight cycling jersey for long rides (brevet) similar function but possibly different fit or features from core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Gore-Tex Infinium long sleeve jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical long sleeve cycling jersey with Gore-Tex, more specialized for weather protection, less similar to a core lightweight jersey.
Almost identical product indicated by name: core, short sleeve cycling jersey, very close in features and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Contender Bicycles Rapha Core Lightweight Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely identical or very close to Rapha Core Lightweight Jersey, very similar cycling jersey type with lightweight construction.
Brevet models are for endurance cycling; similar type but may differ in features and durability compared to the core jersey.
High-quality cycling jersey from a known brand, similar in function and construction though slight brand and product line differences.
Cycling jersey with performance focus, similar silhouette and use case to reference core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Aero Race 8S Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical aero race cycling jersey; similar category but more specialized for aerodynamics than core comfort and durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Pearl Izumi Summit Short-Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey for men, comparable intended use and design features focused on comfort and performance.
Name is generic; assumed cycling jersey but less certain about features and function, moderate relevancy.
Cycling jersey designed to pack down small; somewhat specialized but similar core function as a cycling jersey.
Designed for all-road cycling, similar product type but may have different feature emphasis than core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Elevate Short Sleeve Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Comparable cycling jersey product with short sleeves and performance fabric, similar purposes.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Entrata 3 Full Zip Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full zip short sleeve cycling jersey, similar core function and silhouette to reference jersey.
Cycling jersey likely performance oriented, but name implies different line and possibly different fit or fabric.
Generic name, probably cycling jersey but lacks brand and specifics, moderate relevancy.
Thermal implies insulation and cold weather use, which is less aligned with the lightweight breathable reference jersey.
High-performance cycling jersey, likely similar in construction and intended use to the Pedal Mafia Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Supergiara Logo Cycling Jersey + Shorts Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey as part of a set; similar function but bundled with shorts, slightly different product offering.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Mille GTS Jersey S11
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end cycling jersey focused on comfort and performance, similar core category and function.
Women's cycling jersey; different gender specification so less relevant compared to men's core jersey.
